The game is basically good, the graphics are nice. Pleases a large number of modes. In mm, each rink is radically different from the previous one, you can get bored, or you can sweat, only extremely bad anti-cheat upsets, cheaters get caught quite often. But if you do not pay attention to them, then in general the game is normal. I recommend it.

It was really a really good game, he accompanied me throughout my youth, and I used to think that a fps game from blizzard was a game that made me feel obsessed, but as time went by, I think CS GO was even better. Playing with him doesn't get very boring, and from time to time there are new skins and new activities. In FPS games he can be counted as a bellwether. The only thing that needs to be improved is the judgment and detection of plug-ins, and strive to create a perfect game environment

A childhood game since version 1.6 that we loved to enter with friends and decide who was the best shooter. In the Global Offensive version, we started creating teams and playing more intelligent games trying to win over others.
However, if your nervous system is not too strong and you did not go there just to have fun, then do not go there.
A huge number of cheats with which the developers seem to be trying to fight, but all without success. If there is no cheater in your game, then most likely there will be one or more toxic players who will blame others for everything and spoil the mood and thirst for victory.
Every time I entered this game, I was disappointed in it.
However, like other childhood games, it forever took a place in my heart, breaking it again and again.
